And <S%H29>Abijah<s%> stood <S%H6965>up<s%> upon <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H6787>Zemaraim<s%>, which is in <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H8085>Hear<s%> me, thou <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%>, and all <S%H3478>Israel<s%>;

Ought ye not to <S%H3045>know<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> the <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> over <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>, even to him and to his <S%H1121>sons<s%> by a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H4417>salt<s%>?

Yet <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5028>Nebat<s%>, the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>, is risen <S%H6965>up<s%>, and hath <S%H4775>rebelled<s%> against his <S%H113>lord<s%>.

And now ye <S%H559>think<s%> to <S%H2388>withstand<s%> the <S%H6440>kingdom<s%> <S%H4467><s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> in the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>; and ye be a <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H1995>multitude<s%>, and there are with you <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H5695>calves<s%>, which <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> you for <S%H430>gods<s%>.

Have ye not cast <S%H5080>out<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, and the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>, and have <S%H6213>made<s%> you <S%H3548>priests<s%> after the manner of the <S%H5971>nations<s%> of other <S%H776>lands<s%>? so that whosoever <S%H935>cometh<s%> to <S%H4390>consecrate<s%> <S%H3027><s%> himself with a <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H1241><s%> <S%H6499>bullock<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H352>rams<s%>, the same may be a <S%H3548>priest<s%> of them that are <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%>. to consecrate: Heb. to fill his hand

But as for us, the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is our <S%H430>God<s%>, and we have not <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> him; and the <S%H3548>priests<s%>, which <S%H8334>minister<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, and the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> wait upon their <S%H4399>business<s%>:

And they <S%H6999>burn<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> every <S%H1242>morning<s%> and every <S%H6153>evening<s%> burnt <S%H5930>sacrifices<s%> and <S%H5561>sweet<s%> <S%H7004>incense<s%>: the <S%H3899>shewbread<s%> <S%H4635><s%> also set they in order upon the <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H7979>table<s%>; and the <S%H4501>candlestick<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> with the <S%H5216>lamps<s%> thereof, to <S%H1197>burn<s%> every <S%H6153>evening<s%>: for we <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H4931>charge<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%>; but ye have <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> him.

And, behold, <S%H430>God<s%> himself is with us for our <S%H7218>captain<s%>, and his <S%H3548>priests<s%> with <S%H8643>sounding<s%> <S%H2689>trumpets<s%> to cry <S%H7321>alarm<s%> against you. O <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H3898>fight<s%> ye not against the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of your <S%H1>fathers<s%>; for ye shall not <S%H6743>prosper<s%>.

But <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> caused an <S%H3993>ambushment<s%> to <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H5437>about<s%> <S%H310>behind<s%> them: so they were <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and the <S%H3993>ambushment<s%> was <S%H310>behind<s%> them.

And when <S%H3063>Judah<s%> looked <S%H6437>back<s%>, behold, the <S%H4421>battle<s%> was <S%H6440>before<s%> and <S%H268>behind<s%>: and they <S%H6817>cried<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H2690>sounded<s%> <S%H2690><s%> with the <S%H2689>trumpets<s%>.

Then the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> gave a <S%H7321>shout<s%>: and as the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H7321>shouted<s%>, it came to pass, that <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5062>smote<s%> <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> and all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H29>Abijah<s%> and <S%H3063>Judah<s%>.
And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5127>fled<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%>: and <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>delivered<s%> them into their <S%H3027>hand<s%>.

And <S%H29>Abijah<s%> and his <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5221>slew<s%> them with a <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H4347>slaughter<s%>: so there fell <S%H5307>down<s%> <S%H2491>slain<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H977>chosen<s%> <S%H376>men<s%>.

Thus the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were <S%H3665>brought<s%> under at that <S%H6256>time<s%>, and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H553>prevailed<s%>, because they <S%H8172>relied<s%> upon the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%>.

And <S%H29>Abijah<s%> <S%H7291>pursued<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%>, and <S%H3920>took<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> from him, <S%H1008>Bethel<s%> with the <S%H1323>towns<s%> thereof, and <S%H3466>Jeshanah<s%> with the <S%H1323>towns<s%> thereof, and <S%H6085>Ephrain<s%> with the <S%H1323>towns<s%> thereof.
